meanings.definition: A person who follows a diet consisting mainly or exclusively of fruits.
meanings.sent2: Many fruitarians believe in the health benefits of a fruit-based diet.
meanings.sent3: The fruitarians at the party brought delicious fruit salads.
meanings.sent4: In the land of fruitarians, apples are considered the king of fruits.
meanings.sent5: The fruitarians' dedication to fruits is truly admirable.
